entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming west 20 in the afternoon.
